aircraft.value: Falcon Prime - AC-5958-225 at Zone-4 Facility

defect_observed.value: Fuel nozzle blockage. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 15/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 17/06/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 19/06/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 18/06/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 24/06/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
